title: Type evaluation; requirements; certificate of conformance
context: [ยง486-107] Type evaluation; requirements; certificate of conformance. Any weight or measure, or any weighing or measuring instrument or device, shall have a certificate of conformance indicating that it has passed a national type evaluation by a participating laboratory, prior to being introduced for use for commercial or law enforcement purposes in the State. [L 1991, c 153, pt of ยง6]
